datafield.subfield: The results of a search for two neutrino mode of double K-capture of$^{124}$Xe using a large copper low-background proportional counter are presented. Data collected during 3220 hours of measurements with 58.6 g of$^{124}$Xe provides us to a new limit on the half-life of$^{124}$Xe regarding 2K-capture at the level: T$_{1/2}$ ≥ 2.0 × 10$^{21}$ years at a 90% confidence level.
